org.gridgain.grid.cache.eviction.lirs
Interface GridCacheLirsEvictionPolicyMBean

All Known Implementing Classes:
GridCacheLirsEvictionPolicy
@GridMBeanDescription(value="MBean for LIRS cache eviction policy.")
public interface GridCacheLirsEvictionPolicyMBean

MBean for LIRS eviction policy.

Wiki & Forum:

Method Detail

getMaxSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Maximum allowed main stack size.")
int getMaxSize()
Gets maximum allowed cache size.

Returns:
Maximum allowed cache size.

setMaxSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Sets maximum allowed main stack size.")
void setMaxSize(int max)
Sets maximum allowed cache size.

Parameters:
max - Maximum allowed cache size.

getQueueSizeRatio

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Ratio for HIRS queue size relative to main stack size.")
double getQueueSizeRatio()
Gets ratio for HIRS queue size relative to main stack size.

Returns:
Ratio for HIRS queue size relative to main stack size.

getMaxQueueSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Maximum allowed HIRS queue size.")
int getMaxQueueSize()
Gets maximum allowed size of HIRS queue before entries will start getting evicted. This value is computed based on GridCacheLirsEvictionPolicyMBean.getQueueSizeRatio() value.

Returns:
Maximum allowed size of HIRS queue before entries will start getting evicted.

getMaxStackSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Maximum allowed HIRS queue size.")
int getMaxStackSize()
Gets maximum allowed size of main stack This value is computed based on GridCacheLirsEvictionPolicyMBean.getQueueSizeRatio() value.

Returns:
Maximum allowed size of main stack.

getCurrentStackSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Current main stack size.")
int getCurrentStackSize()
Gets current main stack size.

Returns:
Current main stack size.

getCurrentQueueSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Current HIRS queue size.")
int getCurrentQueueSize()
Gets current HIRS queue size.

Returns:
Current HIRS queue size.

getCurrentStackEdenSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Current stack eden size.")
int getCurrentStackEdenSize()
Gets number of voided nodes that remain on stack to be removed later for better concurrency. This concept is similar to Garbage Collection Eden space, hence the name.

Returns:
Number of voided nodes that remain on stack.

getCurrentQueueEdenSize

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Current queue eden size.")
int getCurrentQueueEdenSize()
Gets number of voided nodes that remain on queue to be removed later for better concurrency. This concept is similar to Garbage Collection Eden space, hence the name.

Returns:
Number of voided nodes that remain on queue.

gc

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Clear eden space from all internal queues.")
void gc()
Clears Eden space for all internal queues.

getAverageQueueGcTime

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Average time spent on GC\'ing queue.")
long getAverageQueueGcTime()
Gets average time spent on GC'ing queue.

Returns:
Average time spent on GC'ing queue.

getAverageStackGcTime

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Average time spent on GC\'ing stack.")
long getAverageStackGcTime()
Gets average time spent on GC'ing stack.

Returns:
Average time spent on GC'ing stack.

@GridMBeanDescription(value="Number of queue nodes GC\'ed.")
long getQueueNodesGced()
Gets number of queue nodes GC'ed by this policy.

Returns:
Number of queue nodes GC'ed by this policy.

long getStackNodesGced()
